text: Hey there, this is action team where we are responsible for Custom Code action maintenance. <@U0336QCR2FQ> could you clarify time out for me a bit more? is timeout occur without going through execution when you have above 200 record or after execution?

hey this is random, but did workflows get faster/get improvements in parallel tasks? I just ran a workflow that adjusted ~2k deal records, and they were all done within 10 seconds max. Seems like thatâ€™s usually like a 5 minute task or so.
